comments.author: AutoModerator
comments.body:
This post may be mentioning looking for apartments. Consider checking out [some recent threads](https://www.reddit.com/r/Birmingham/search/?q=apartments+OR+apartment&include_over_18=on&restrict_sr=on&t=new&sort=new) about apartment hunting. **Avoid renting from H2 at all costs**, even as abundant as their properties are and as cheap as rent seems [(see an abundance of horror stories here)](https://www.reddit.com/r/Birmingham/search/?q=h2&include_over_18=on&restrict_sr=on&t=new&sort=relevance). Consider reaching out to [RentMonster](https://rentmonster.net/), a free local apartment hunting service that's found a ton of /r/Birmingham -sters their apartments to help you find a non-H2 property. Also consider checking out [Dwell](https://www.livewithdwell.com/availability/) properties, who is pretty well regarded by this subreddit, or also consider driving around looking for signs for private landlords.

*I am a bot, and this action was performed automatically. Please [contact the moderators of this subreddit](/message/compose/?to=/r/Birmingham) if you have any questions or concerns.*

comments.body: Only thing I've did was flip the bird at my side view mirror from within my car once since he flashed me. And I guess that's enough to follow someone home and block them in the parking spot.

comments.body: That's more than enough for many people. It's just as effective to your dopamine response if they don't see it. Try it.

comments.author: iRudi94
comments.body:
The guy that followed her is definitely a dumbass. 

But she for sure needs to learn from this and think to herself next time if it is worth it to even give someone the finger whenever you’re not prepared for how far a dumbass would take it.
